select a.id, a.hosp_code, a.distribute_id, a.op_id, a.opd_id, a.old_cost_id, a.cost_id, a.item_code, a.item_id, a.item_name, a.spec, a.dosage, a.dosage_unit_code, a.num, a.unit_code, a.price, a.split_ratio, a.split_unit_code, a.split_price, a.split_num, a.total_price, a.chinese_drug_num, a.usage_code, a.use_code, a.back_num, a.total_back_num, a.old_dist_id, a.status_code, a.curr_unit_code,a.crte_id,a.crte_name,a.crte_time, (CONCAT(c.name,'/', (ifnull(( SELECT e.NAME FROM sys_code_detail e WHERE e.VALUE = c.gender_code and e.hosp_code = c.hosp_code AND e.c_code = 'XB' ), '' )),'/', ifnull(c.age,''), (ifnull(( SELECT NAME FROM sys_code_detail WHERE c_code = 'NLDW' AND VALUE = c.age_unit_code AND hosp_code = c.hosp_code ), '岁' )))) as patientInfo,b.dept_name, case when a.item_code = '1' then bd.code when a.item_code = '2' then d.code end code, (case when a.item_code = '1' then bd.type_code when a.item_code = '2' then d.type_code end) typeCode, CASE a.item_code WHEN '1' THEN ( SELECT NAME FROM base_product WHERE CODE = bd.prod_code AND hosp_code = bd.hosp_code ) WHEN '2' THEN ( SELECT NAME FROM base_product WHERE CODE = d.prod_code AND hosp_code = d.hosp_code ) END prodName from phar_out_distribute_all_detail a left join phar_out_distribute pod on a.distribute_id = pod.id and a.hosp_code = pod.hosp_code join outpt_prescribe b on b.id = a.op_id and b.hosp_code = a.hosp_code join outpt_visit c on c.id = b.visit_id and c.hosp_code = b.hosp_code left join base_drug bd on a.item_code='1' and bd.id=a.item_id and bd.hosp_code=a.hosp_code left join base_material d on a.item_code='2' and d.id=a.item_id and d.hosp_code=a.hosp_code where a.hosp_code = #{hospCode} and a.num > 0
and b.dept_id = #{deptId}
and pod.phar_id = #{pharId}

and date(a.crte_time) <= date(#{endTime})

order by a.crte_time desc
